name: Brushes & Besties!
description: Join us on August 4th (Friendship Day!) for an epic paint party! Create unforgettable memories with your besties through creativity and fun. Whether you’re coming with a group of friends or flying solo, everyone is welcome to join the fun!Event Highlights:Date: August 4thTime: 4 to 6pmLocation: Board in the City, KoramangalaWhat’s in Store:Collaborative Tote Bag Painting: Each friend’s design will fit together like a puzzle to form one big masterpiece!Swap Party Madness: Every 5 minutes, swap your tote bag with a friend and continue painting. Add your unique touch to each other’s bags.Take Home a Keepsake: End the event with a beautifully painted tote bag filled with your friends’ creativity.Tickets: Rs 899 (includes a Rs 299 redeemable food/beverage voucher)Don't miss out on this fun and creative celebration of friendship. Grab your friends or come solo and join us for a day of painting, laughter and unforgettable memories!

location.address: 7th Cross Rd, KHB Colony, 7th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Pop Up Paint Party by Manisha
organizer.description: Whether you’re celebrating a birthday or a baby-shower, planning a girl’s night out or a corporate event, we’ll work with you to create a bespoke experience that meets your needs. Unleash your inner Picasso while having a blast!

name: Plats around the world by Plats, Delhi | Conservatory, Bangalore
description: Plats Around the World: Delhi's Finest by Chefs Hanisha and JamsheedPlats brings the world to your plate with its unique culinary spin. Chefs and Patrons Hanisha and Jamsheed present a contemporary dining experience showcasing honest plates of food that transcend specific cuisines. Their dishes are technique-driven, using the finest seasonal produce and globally inspired flavors. The result is food that is refined yet comforting, familiar yet creative.The menu is an amalgamation of dishes inspired by the chefs' travels and cherished meals with family and friends. With a focus on flavor-forward dishes, no-fuss plating, and hearty portions, Plats embodies what Hanisha and Jamsheed love to eat, cook, and share.SET MENUPLEASE NOTE:The vegetarian menu includes dishes that contain eggs. We can provide eggless alternatives upon prior request.If you have a seafood allergy, we can replace seafood courses on the non-vegetarian menu with vegetarian option.Please mention your preferences while booking your spot.Vegetarian Tasting MenuCourse 1Crisp potato pave, smoked carrot lox tartare, dill cream cheese, capers, pickled shallots Course 2Charred young broccoli, sambal romesco, burnt lime and peanut crumble Course 3Char grilled exotic mushrooms, yellow chilli and feta huancaina, smoked bandel cheese, pickled chillies and picante salsaCourse 4Pan fried gnocchi, smoked eggplant kashq, charred tomatoes, pistachio, pomegranate molasses, fetaCourse 5Roasted butternut squash mille feuille, sauce verdure, sweet potato crumb, chevre, pickles Course 6Vanilla and Coconut tres leches, passionfruit curd, ginger lime crumb Course 7Slow baked dark chocolate apricot cake with spiced namelaka and cocoa nib and almond tuilleNon-Vegetarian Tasting MenuCourse 1Prawn and calamari plancha, zesty passionfruit tigre de leches, celery herb salad, prawn oilCourse 2Korean fried shrimp stuffed chicken wing, gochuchang caramel, kimchi, sesame and scallionCourse 3Smoked pork and chorizo dumpling, spiced chorizo and tomato broth, bacon crumble and pickled green appleCourse 4Chicken steak presse, stuffed morrels, roast garlic and miso emulsion, chicken jus Course 5Braised and pulled lamb crumbed steak, caramelized onion and mint, spiced lamb jus, mashed potatoesCourse 6Vanilla and Coconut tres leches, passionfruit curd, ginger lime crumb Course 7Slow baked brandy dark chocolate and apricot cake with spiced namelaka and cocoa nib and almond tuilleTerms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 7 and above require a ticket to attend the meal. If you are bringing a child under 7, please inform us in advance, as we do not have a baby seat at the venue.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: Private Guided Tour of the Automotive Wonders of the World!
description: For a limited group of individuals, we will open out a treasure trove hidden in Bangalore! You will get to experience the restoration, preservation & collection of Historic Cars, Motorcycles, Carriages and all things automotive passionately built over the past 40 years!

location.address: Rajarajeshwari Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

organizer.name: Classic Chase
organizer.description: Immerse yourself in an era gone by...

name: day retreat - Animal flow & brunch
description: Come join us for a day filled with fun , relaxation and good food. It’s an all day retreat which entails a combination of activities and food breaks. The whole event is tailored keeping in mind , nourishment for the body and mind so take a break and indulge in some mindful activities. The day should look like 930 am - Arrival Upon arrival indulge in some healthy nourishing breakfast.10am  Warm up with some fun game and activities 11am - 12pm Functional training to prepare for the events to follow and end with a session of tug of war12pm to 1 pm Indulge in some lip smacking food laid out as a communal lunch by Master chef Arthi , whose has a speciality pop up restaurant Ragù1pm - 2pm You have some free time , use this time for conversations , a stroll in the farm or read a book 2pm - 4pm We will have a session of animal flow taught by Ranjit from ,Academy of strength , followed by mobility and flexibility session.4pm to 5pm Indulge in snacks and some fun games to end the session

location.address: 2985+HW, Bolamaranahalli, Karnataka 562162, India

organizer.name: KSARAAH
organizer.description: we are an organic farm hosting a variety of activities over the weekend

name: Hangover Breakfast with Strangers
description: Had a wild night and need a good recovery breakfast? Join us for a fun and delicious hangover breakfast table.Come as you are, and let's enjoy some hearty breakfast dishes, strong coffee, and good company. It's the perfect way to share last night's stories, laugh off the hangover, and start the day with new friends.Feel free to bring anyone who could use a good breakfast and a few laughs. See you there!

location.address: Maratt Estate, Bannerghatta Rd, opposite Shell Petrol Pump, Dollar Layout, Phase 4, J. P. Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560076, India

organizer.name: TwoTablesClub
organizer.description: Where a small group of strangers come together for genuine conversations & spontaneous connections  over a curated meal. Guided by a host every Table is a mix of locals & newcomers sharing stories of their roots & dreams

name: Screening: Jojo Rabbit (2019) | Movie Under the Stars
description: Join us for an open-air screening of ”Jojo Rabbit” (2019), with a three-course dinner and popcorn.*Wines will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieJojo Rabbit (2019) is a satirical film directed by Taika Waititi. Set in Nazi Germany during World War II, the story follows Johannes "Jojo" Betzler, a 10-year-old boy who is an enthusiastic member of the Hitler Youth. Jojo idolizes Adolf Hitler, who appears to him in the form of an imaginary friend played by Waititi himself.3-Course Menu by Devika from Daewoo Tarts & MoreStartersRoasted Vegetable GaletteMainsChicken Stroganoff with Herbed RiceORVegetable Stroganoff with Herbed RiceDessertOrange 5 Ways TartTerms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

name: In The House with Larder & Folk at Muro
description: An exclusive two-day collaborative breakfast event at MURO, featuring Goa’s finest bakery, Larder and Folk, and exceptional coffee by Beanrove. Get ready for a unique fusion of Thai, Cantonese, and Asian bakery delights, along with experimental microlots of coffee.

name: Warrior Rhythm Brunch with Usha
description: Come join us and explore a 70 minute Warrior Rhythm workshop with Usha Rao.WARRIOR Rhythm™ is a fusion of rebel yoga flows + strength training + HIIT + mindfulness rolled into one insanely rhythmic experience! Fitness-focused with yoga undertones, it increases overall strength, flexibility, and balance.Followed by a warrior brunch, including an energizing ginger shot, protein breakfast bowls and tropical protein packed smoothie bowls in our natural, serene setting at The Studio by Copper + Cloves will be the perfect start to your weekend!

location.name: Copper + Cloves
location.address: 4th Floor, 167, 2nd Stage, 2nd Cross, Shankarnag Rd, Stage 2, Domlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071, India

organizer.name: Copper + Cloves
organizer.description: We are all about nourishing food and creating spaces for connection!

name: Friendship Day Party
description: Looking to celebrate Friendship Day with a nostalgic twist, meet new people, and have a fantastic time? Join us for a fun and casual Friendship Day Lunch! This is the perfect opportunity to connect with old friends and make new ones while enjoying a delicious meal. Reminisce about the good old days, share your favourite memories, and create new one. Everyone is welcome to this nostalgic fun celebration.Friendly conversationsDelicious Food OptionsIce breakersFun ActivitiesGames from your childhoodGiveawaysUnforgettable MemoriesLet’s dress retro and bring those nostalgic vibes to life!

location.address: PrimeCo Union City, Unit No. 8, TOWER-B, Podium level, 19A & 19B of, Sadara Mangala Industrial Area, Thigalarapalya, Whitefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560066, India

name: Studio Ghibli Pop-Up @ Bento Bento
description: We're bringing Studio Ghibli's magic to life at Bento Bento!Chef Anumitra of Edible Archives and Bento Bento, a lifelong fan of Studio Ghibli, has masterfully translated some beloved food scenes from Miyazaki's cherished films from the big screen to the plate. All fans of these movies and series are familiar with their iconic dishes, and Chef Anumitra, with her extensive travel and work experience in Japan, has the expertise needed to make these dishes authentic and delicious. Menu Highlights·   Bacon and Eggs (Howl's Moving Castle) A skillet of fresh eggs cooked with thickly sliced bacon. While it won't be cooked with the help of a fire demon, it will still be done to perfection.·   Pancakes, Bacon, Sausage, and Tomato (Kiki's Delivery Service) This simple yet filling breakfast feast is delicious and demonstrates that breakfast can be an all-day meal.·   Ramen (Ponyo) This iconic scene features simple yet delicious ramen. Our versions include in-house ramen noodles in a shoyu broth, either as a vegetarian option, or with slices of ham and a half-boiled egg, replicating the home-style preparation in Japan.·   Onigiri (Spirited Away) In the series, these rice balls help Chihiro escape with their hidden superpowers. Ours might not have magic powers, but they are definitely high on magical taste with surprise fillings.·   Satsuki’s Bento Box (My Neighbor Totoro) Totoro is one of the most iconic Ghibli films, loved worldwide. Our bento box stays true to the traditional offering in the series with minor variations.·   Mackerel Fry (Up on Poppy Hill) This butterflied mackerel dish is iconic in its scene and delicious in taste.·   Lupin III Spaghetti (The Castle of Cagliostro) This dish is featured in a memorable scene where Arsène Lupin III enjoys spaghetti with his friend Jigen. Although it seems unusual, it showcases how Japanese cuisine embraces Western dishes.·   Tomato Stew with Cheesy Bread (Tales from Earthsea) A simple, flavourful tomato soup perfect for the gloomy Bangalore weather.·   Rich Double Chocolate Cake (Kiki's Delivery Service) A cake fully approved by the young witch Kiki, making it the perfect way to end the meal.·   Anman (Spirited Away) A steamed bun with red bean paste, it showcases traditional Japanese dessert flavours in an unusual profile for Indian palates.The dishes will be served à la carte, over both lunch and dinner. Join us for a magical culinary journey as we bring the enchanting world of Studio Ghibli to life in Bangalore!

location.name: Bento Bento
location.address: 197, Paramahansa Yogananda Rd, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038, India

Our bento box stays true to the traditional offering in the series with minor variations.·   Mackerel Fry (Up on Poppy Hill) This butterflied mackerel dish is iconic in its scene and delicious in taste.·   Lupin III Spaghetti (The Castle of Cagliostro) This dish is featured in a memorable scene where Arsène Lupin III enjoys spaghetti with his friend Jigen. Although it seems unusual, it showcases how Japanese cuisine embraces Western dishes.·   Tomato Stew with Cheesy Bread (Tales from Earthsea) A simple, flavourful tomato soup perfect for the gloomy Bangalore weather.·   Rich Double Chocolate Cake (Kiki's Delivery Service) A cake fully approved by the young witch Kiki, making it the perfect way to end the meal.·   Anman (Spirited Away) A steamed bun with red bean paste, it showcases traditional Japanese dessert flavours in an unusual profile for Indian palates.The dishes will be served à la carte, over both lunch and dinner. Join us for a magical culinary journey as we bring the enchanting world of Studio Ghibli to life in Bangalore!

location.name: Bento Bento
location.address: 197, Paramahansa Yogananda Rd, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038, India

name: Studio Ghibli Pop-Up @ Bento Bento
description: We're bringing Studio Ghibli's magic to life at Bento Bento!Chef Anumitra of Edible Archives and Bento Bento, a lifelong fan of Studio Ghibli, has masterfully translated some beloved food scenes from Miyazaki's cherished films from the big screen to the plate. All fans of these movies and series are familiar with their iconic dishes, and Chef Anumitra, with her extensive travel and work experience in Japan, has the expertise needed to make these dishes authentic and delicious. Menu Highlights·   Bacon and Eggs (Howl's Moving Castle) A skillet of fresh eggs cooked with thickly sliced bacon. While it won't be cooked with the help of a fire demon, it will still be done to perfection.·   Pancakes, Bacon, Sausage, and Tomato (Kiki's Delivery Service) This simple yet filling breakfast feast is delicious and demonstrates that breakfast can be an all-day meal.·   Ramen (Ponyo) This iconic scene features simple yet delicious ramen. Our versions include in-house ramen noodles in a shoyu broth, either as a vegetarian option, or with slices of ham and a half-boiled egg, replicating the home-style preparation in Japan.·   Onigiri (Spirited Away) In the series, these rice balls help Chihiro escape with their hidden superpowers. Ours might not have magic powers, but they are definitely high on magical taste with surprise fillings.·   Satsuki’s Bento Box (My Neighbor Totoro) Totoro is one of the most iconic Ghibli films, loved worldwide. Our bento box stays true to the traditional offering in the series with minor variations.·   Mackerel Fry (Up on Poppy Hill) This butterflied mackerel dish is iconic in its scene and delicious in taste.·   Lupin III Spaghetti (The Castle of Cagliostro) This dish is featured in a memorable scene where Arsène Lupin III enjoys spaghetti with his friend Jigen. Although it seems unusual, it showcases how Japanese cuisine embraces Western dishes.·   Tomato Stew with Cheesy Bread (Tales from Earthsea) A simple, flavourful tomato soup perfect for the gloomy Bangalore weather.·   Rich Double Chocolate Cake (Kiki's Delivery Service) A cake fully approved by the young witch Kiki, making it the perfect way to end the meal.·   Anman (Spirited Away) A steamed bun with red bean paste, it showcases traditional Japanese dessert flavours in an unusual profile for Indian palates.The dishes will be served à la carte, over both lunch and dinner. Join us for a magical culinary journey as we bring the enchanting world of Studio Ghibli to life in Bangalore!

name: Kids Playdate At the yard | In collaboration with The LooRoo Club
description: Monthly Kids Playdate is here! 🌟We’ve got two fun-filled slots for different age groups:10:30 AM - 12:00 PM: Ahoy, Little Ocean Explorers!Age Group: 2 to 4 yearsDive into a sea of adventure with corals, starfish, and pirate tales. Expect splashes, mess, and lots of giggles!3:00 PM - 4:30 PM: The LooRoo Tea Party!Age Group: 4 to 8 yearsEnjoy a magical tea party inspired by ‘The Tiger Who Came to Tea.’ Delight in tiger-striped art, storytelling, and a touch of mischief.Choose your adventure and join us for a wonderful day of exploration and fun! Terms and ConditionsThe management bears no responsibility for any injury or damage incurred during the event.Purchase tickets exclusively from the designated ticketing platform.No refunds for no-shows or cancellations under any circumstances.Tickets are non-transferable and intended for personal use only.Event schedule and menu subject to change in case of emergencies or events beyond our control.The management will not entertain liability claims arising from the consumption of food or beverages.Parking near the event venue is at the vehicle owner's risk. Paid valet parking available at Rs. 200 per car.Ticket holders grant organizers perpetual rights to use any recorded video or still footage of their appearance on any channel, without further approval.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

name: Soul Of Sri Lanka
description: Tijouri is a pioneering Indian restaurant that offers a unique dining experience through monthly pop-ups featuring home chefs from across India. Located at Radisson Blu Atria, Bangalore, Tijouri aims to bring the diverse flavours of India to the heart of Bangalore, celebrating the rich culinary traditions of the country through an authentic and immersive dining experience. Our mission is to preserve traditional recipes and introduce them to a wider audience through both dining experiences and retail products.As our second pop up we bring to you the Soul of Sri Lanka by Amara Balakrishnan. Amara, an Indian who married a Sri Lankan, has mastered the art of authentic Sri Lankan cuisine. Her culinary journey began with a deep love for cooking, which inspired her to embrace and perfect the diverse flavours of Sri Lankan cuisine upon moving there. Amra's expertise beautifully blends the vibrant styles of both Sinhalese and Jaffna cooking, creating a unique and delightful culinary experience. Today, she channels her passion into Suvvai, a thriving home-based kitchen where her exceptional dishes bring the rich, aromatic tastes of Sri Lanka to life.The menu coming soon.Terms & Conditions:Please arrive punctually.Late arrivals may miss the first few courses.Booking Fee are non-refundable under all circumstances once booked. Tickets are transferrable to a third party.No shows/ cancellations will not be refunded, but you can reschedule your booking for within the week 48hrs before your slot is due.Alcohol will not be served to guests under the age of 21No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.The booking fee total includes the online transaction fee.Parking at the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet is available.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. Incase you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

location.address: 1, Palace Rd, Ambedkar Veedhi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: Screening of House Of The Dragon Finale
description: Join us for an evening of grand import to witness the season finale of House of the Dragon! On 5th August, we begin with a pre-screening feast at 8:00, where lords and ladies may indulge in delicacies and spirited discourse about the series' intrigues and betrayals.At 8:00PM(sharp), the viewing commences, followed by a council featuring esteemed guests with intimate knowledge of the series and celebrated voices of the realm. Do not miss this rare chance to witness the season's breathtaking conclusion on the grandest of screens, amongst kindred spirits. Secure your place now, and prepare for a night of fire and blood!

location.address: 21, 80 Feet Rd, Nirguna Mandir Layout, 4th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

name: Clay Play- Ceramic houses(for incense/tea light)
description: Join us for a delightful workshop where you can create your own ceramic tea light houses! This hands-on session is perfect for beginners and seasoned potters alike, offering a relaxing and creative environment to craft charming, decorative houses that glow beautifully when lit from within.What You’ll Learn:Introduction to Ceramics:Overview of ceramic materials and tools.Basics of working with clay.Design & Planning:Sketching your tea light house design.Considering the size, shape, and details like windows, doors, and roof features.Hand-Building Techniques:Rolling and cutting slabs of clay.Assembling the house structure using techniques like scoring and slipping.Detailing & Texturing:Adding decorative elements, textures, and patterns.Carving out windows and other openings to let the light shine through.Finishing Touches:Smoothing edges and refining details.Applying underglazes for added color and design.Glazing & Firing:Overview of the glazing process.Explanation of the firing process and kiln operation (firing will typically occur after the workshop, with pieces available for pickup later).

location.address: No.6, 1st cross road, next to Bethany Nursery School, Koramangala 8th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Trayah Pottery
organizer.description: A pottery studio, community space and a second home for many!
